Title: Kissing Jessica Stein
Actors: Jennifer Westfeldt, Tovah Feldshuh, Esther Wurmfeld, Hillel Friedman
Plot: Jessica Stein is a single, straight, successful, journalist, part of a bonded Jewish family living in New York City, who finds herself not as straight as she thought when Jessica meets and begins an intense friendship with career woman Helen Cooper which ultimately leads to romance.
